import{createApi,fetchBaseQuery}from"@reduxjs/toolkit/query/react";// api url
var baseUrl="http://127.0.0.1:8000/api";// Heroes' Section
export var HomeDetails=createApi({reducerPath:"HomeDetails",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseUrl}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getHomeDetails:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/home-api";}})};}});// About
export var AboutMe=createApi({reducerPath:"AboutMe",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseUrl}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getAboutMe:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/aboutme-api";}})};}});// Services
export var Services=createApi({reducerPath:"Services",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseUrl}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getServices:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/allServices-api";}})};}});// Skills
export var Progress=createApi({reducerPath:"Progress",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseUrl}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getProgress:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/progress-api";}})};}});// Projects
export var Projects=createApi({reducerPath:"Projects",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseUrl}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getProjects:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/projects-api";}})};}});// Contacts
export var Contacts=createApi({reducerPath:"Contacts",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseUrl}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getContacts:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/contacts-api";}})};}});// Social Media
export var SocialMedia=createApi({reducerPath:"SocialMedia",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseUrl}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getSocialMedia:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/links-api";}})};}});// Languages Icons
export var LanguagesIcons=createApi({reducerPath:"LanguagesIcons",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseUrl}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getLanguagesIcons:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/lang-icons-api";}})};}});var useGetHomeDetailsQuery=HomeDetails.useGetHomeDetailsQuery;export{useGetHomeDetailsQuery};var useGetAboutMeQuery=AboutMe.useGetAboutMeQuery;export{useGetAboutMeQuery};var useGetServicesQuery=Services.useGetServicesQuery;export{useGetServicesQuery};var useGetProgressQuery=Progress.useGetProgressQuery;export{useGetProgressQuery};var useGetProjectsQuery=Projects.useGetProjectsQuery;export{useGetProjectsQuery};var useGetContactsQuery=Contacts.useGetContactsQuery;export{useGetContactsQuery};var useGetSocialMediaQuery=SocialMedia.useGetSocialMediaQuery;export{useGetSocialMediaQuery};var useGetLanguagesIconsQuery=LanguagesIcons.useGetLanguagesIconsQuery;export{useGetLanguagesIconsQuery};
